##  Set up chunk
```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse) #general use package
library(lterdatasampler) #package of data frames
library(viridis)
data(pie_crab) #importing pie_crab data
```

# New selection: exploratory visualization

```{r}
#| label: latitude size plot
#base layer for plot
ggplot(data = pie_crab, #data is pie_crab
       aes(x = latitude, #x is latitude
           y = size,   #y is size
           color = site)) +
  geom_point() + #creating scatter plot
  theme_minimal() + #changing theme
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, #selecting specific color palette from viridis package
                      option = "plasma") 

```
